DOC.HEADLINE: BISHOP ' S MARRIAGE BOOK AROUSES INTEREST
DOC.TEXT: A British bishop whose new book on marriage includes explicit advice about arousing your partner and making_love around the house says he is amused by the interest it has generated . " Our Flesh , " the chapter on sex in the Rev . Michael Baughen ' s book , also describes orgasm as " an experience like no other " and recommends experiments with novel sexual positions . " After all , God meant us to enjoy sex . He made us the way we are and gave us the parts. " The 64-year-old Bishop of Chester and his wife , Myrtle , married for 38 years , wrote " Your Marriage " as a wide-ranging advice manual for couples .
